indications:
Indications 
(From Nitrous oxide: British National Formulary)
Nitrous oxide
name: NITROUS OXIDE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Nitrous oxide: British National Formulary)
Nitrous oxide; interactions: Appendix 1 (anaesthetics, general)
side-effects:
Side-effects 
(From Nitrous oxide: British National Formulary)
Nitrous oxide
doses:
Maintenance of anaesthesia in conjunction with other anaesthetic
agents, by inhalation using suitable anaesthetic apparatus,
50–66% in oxygen

Analgesia, by inhalation using suitable apparatus,
up to 50% in oxygen, according to the patient’s needs
pregnancy: Pregnancy may depress neonatal respiration if used during delivery
